long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Email tracking, CRM for Gmail
HAL ERP CRM connects to Gmail to help you uncover more leads in less time, connect with those leads, and close deals faster while managing all your contacts in one central database.

Note: A HAL ERP account is required to use this extension.

Features include:

Email tracking
Tag emails to your CRM Contacts/Deals

Learn more about HAL ERP at https://www.halsimplify.com
